short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse anyone's timeline and see their tweets from the past.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take a seat in the time machine! 

The simple, intuitive interface allows you to browse anyone's tweets history, by time period since they joined or by month since they joined the platform.

Click on Fetch profile again if you're encountering an issue.
Hope you'll enjoy digging in the past!

If you do, you can support me by buying me a cappuccino ☕️
https://buymeacoffee.com/annedevj

Upvote it on ProductHunt :)
https://www.producthunt.com/posts/time-machine-x
